entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as a person who has complained to the school governors and Ministry of Magic about his injury. He is described as having a lot of influence due to his father's position.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a person who is talking to Malfoy and threatening him with a real injury if he continues to complain.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who is accusing Malfoy of trying to get Hagrid fired by putting on an injury.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as a person who might be fired due to Malfoy's actions.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is mentioned as an organization that Malfoy has complained to about his injury.

entities.name: school governors
entities.description: The school governors are mentioned as an organization that Malfoy has complained to about his injury.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as a person who is struggling in Potions lessons and is afraid of Professor Snape.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as a person who is teaching Potions and is feared by Neville.

entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Weasley is mentioned as a person who is helping Malfoy with his caterpillars.

relationships.description: Malfoy complained to the Ministry of Magic about his injury.
Malfoy complained to the school governors about his injury.
Harry accused Malfoy of trying to get Hagrid fired by putting on an injury.
Neville is afraid of Professor Snape.
Weasley helped Malfoy with his caterpillars.
